start.text: Let's see how good of a ship this thing is.

start_boss.text: Better get a raise after this eh?.

retreat.text: Mission failed, we'll get em' next time.
Hey whatever works for you, I'm in it for the money.
What the hell was that shit?

out_of_missiles.text: Ordinance officer says we're all out. Crap.
Hey don't look at me, I'm just piloting the ship no?

engaged.text: Switch all power to frontal weapons.
Let's make use of those ordnance points!
Engaging close quarter! Watch for friendlies!

need_help.text: Holding out still, what's the ETA on reinforcement?

pursuing.text: Dun't feel right, but I'm not paid to give opinions.

running.text: That won't do, we're pulling back.
Activity spike on my coordinates! Going dark!

hull_90.text: Get yourself together men! Lest shit's hits the fan!

hull_50.text: What is going on back there?!
Vessel's still ship worthy, continuing the assault.

hull_30.text: Barely in combat condition, requesting clearance to retreat, over.
Damage control's not responding, where are they dammit!?
Combat capability's severely reduced, requesting to retreat.

overload.text: *Electronic's buzzing* Fixing the problem right now
Grr, remind me to upgrade flux vents after this.

victory.text: Let's regroup and plan the next move.
